  (g₂ : a * (b + c - a) ≤ b * (a + c - b))
  (g₃ : b * (a + c - b) ≤ c * (a + b - c)), 0 ≤ a ^ 2 * b * (a - b) + b ^ 2 * c * (b - c) + c ^ 2 * a * (c - a)

theorems.name: imo_1983_p6_3_4

∀ (a b c : ℝ)

theorems.name: imo_1983_p6_4_8

  b * c * (a * (b + c - a)) + a * c * (b * (a + c - b)) + a * b * (c * (a + b - c))

  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hfi : fi = fun n ↦ Function.invFun (f₀ n))
  (n : ℕ)
  (x y : NNReal)
  (hn₀ : 0 < n)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_1
theorems.statement:

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_1_1
theorems.statement:

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_3

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_3_1

  (hfb₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 - 1 / ↑↑n)
  (hfc₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) = 1), ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) - f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 / ↑↑n

  (hfc₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) = 1)
  (n : ↑sn)
  (hn₀ : 0 < n.1), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) - f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 / ↑↑n

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (h₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n ∧ 0 < x → 0 < f n x)
  (h₃ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 ≤ f n x), ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → x < y → f n x < f n y

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₃ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 ≤ f n x)
  (h₄ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → x < y → f n x < f n y)
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₀ : f₀ = fun n x => (f n x).toNNReal), ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f₀ n)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (hmo₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → Function.Injective (f n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hmo₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f₀ n))
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hfi : fi = fun n => Function.invFun (f₀ n)), ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = y → fi n y = x

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₀ : f₀ = fun n x => (f n x).toNNReal), ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → Continuous (f₀ n)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_11
theorems.statement:
∀ (sn : Set ℕ)
  (fb fc : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfc₂ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), fb n < fc n)
  (hfb₃ : StrictMono fb)
  (hfc₃ : StrictAnti fc)
  (sb sc : Set NNReal)
  (hsb₀ : sb = Set.range fb)
  (hsc₀ : sc = Set.range fc)
  (fr : NNReal → ℝ)
  (hfr : fr = fun x ↦ ↑x)
  (sbr scr : Set ℝ)
  (hsbr : sbr = fr '' sb)
  (hscr : scr = fr '' sc)
  (br cr : ℝ)
  (hbr₀ : IsLUB sbr br)
  (hcr₀ : IsGLB scr cr)
  (hfb₄ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 ≤ fb n), br ≤ cr

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_9
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x = ↑(f₀ n x))
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (hmo₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f₀ n))
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₅ : ∀ (x : NNReal), fi 1 x = x)
  (hmo₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → Function.RightInverse (fi n) (f₀ n))
  (hf₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → (f₀ n x = y ↔ fi n y = x))
  (fb : ℕ → NNReal)
  (hfb₀ : fb = fun n => fi n (1 - 1 / ↑n))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn : sn = Set.Ici 1), StrictMonoOn fb sn

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_10
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hmo₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → Function.RightInverse (fi n) (f₀ n))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (sb : Set NNReal)
  (fb : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hfb₀ : fb = fun n:↑sn => fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n))
  (hsb₀ : sb = Set.range fb)
  (fr : NNReal → ℝ)
  (hfr: fr = fun x => ↑x)
  (sbr : Set ℝ)
  (hsbr: sbr = fr '' sb)
  (br: ℝ)
  (hbr₀ : IsLUB sbr br), 0 < br

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (hmo₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f n))
  (h₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x < f (n + 1) x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x), ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal),
  (∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → 0 < f n y₁ ∧ f n y₁ < f (n + 1) y₁ ∧ f (n + 1) y₁ < 1) →
  (∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → 0 < f n y₂ ∧ f n y₂ < f (n + 1) y₂ ∧ f (n + 1) y₂ < 1) → y₁ = y₂

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_22
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (x y : NNReal)
  (sd : Set ℕ := Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ := fun y₁ y₂ n ↦ f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (sx : Set ℝ)
  (hsx : sx = Set.Ioo (-1) 1)
  (N i : ↑sd)
  (hi₀ : ∀ (a : ↑sd), i ≤ a → ↑↑N + 3 ≤ fd x y a)
  (hi₁ : N.1 + i.1 ∈ sd)
  (a : ↑sd)
  (ha : a = ⟨↑N + ↑i, hi₁⟩), N ≤ a ∧ fd x y a ∉ sx

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n ∧ 0 < x → 0 < f n x)
  (hmo₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x = ↑(f₀ n x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (fb fc : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfb₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 - 1 / ↑↑n)
  (hfc₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) = 1)
  (hfb₃ : StrictMono fb)
  (hfc₃ : StrictAnti fc)
  (sb sc : Set NNReal)
  (hsb₀ : sb = Set.range fb)
  (hsc₀ : sc = Set.range fc)
  (fr : NNReal → ℝ)
  (hfr : fr = fun x => ↑x)
  (sbr scr : Set ℝ)
  (hsbr : sbr = fr '' sb)
  (hscr : scr = fr '' sc)
  (br cr : ℝ)
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x)
  (hbr₁ : 0 < br)
  (hu₅ : br ≤ cr)
  (hbr₃ : ∀ x ∈ sbr, x ≤ br)
  (hcr₃ : ∀ x ∈ scr, cr ≤ x), ∃ x, ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → 0 < f n x ∧ f n x < f (n + 1) x ∧ f (n + 1) x < 1

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_23
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (x y : NNReal)
  (sd : Set ℕ := Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ := fun y₁ y₂ n ↦ f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (sx : Set ℝ)
  (hsx : sx = Set.Ioo (-1) 1)
  (N i : ↑sd)
  (hi₀ : ∀ (a : ↑sd), i ≤ a → ↑↑N + 3 ≤ fd x y a)
  (hi₁ : N.1 + ↑i ∈ sd)

  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (fb fc : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfb₀ : fb = sn.restrict fun n ↦ fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n))
  (hfb₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 - 1 / ↑↑n)
  (hfc₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) = 1)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_19
theorems.statement:

  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)

  (hi : 2 ∈ sd)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (hi₁ : i = ⟨2, hi⟩)
  (z : ℝ)
  (hz₁ : 0 < fd a b i)
  (j : ℕ)
  (hj : j = ⌈2 + Real.log (z / fd a b i) / Real.log (3 / 2)⌉₊)
  (hj₁ : j ∈ sd)
  (k : ↑sd)
  (hk₀ : ⟨j, hj₁⟩ ≤ k)
  (hk₁ : fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (k.1 - 2) ≤ fd a b k)
  (hk₂ : i < k), z ≤ fd a b k

  (hk₀ : ⟨j, hj₁⟩ ≤ k)
  (hk₂ : i < k), z / fd a b i ≤ (3 / 2) ^ (k.1 - 2)

  (hy₃ : ∀ (U : Set ℝ), 0 ∈ U → IsOpen U → ∃ N, ∀ (n : ↑sd), N ≤ n → fd x y n ∈ U), False

  (hf₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x = ↑(f₀ n x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (fb : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfb₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fb n) = 1 - 1 / ↑↑n)
  (br : ℝ)
  (n : ℕ)
  (hn₀ : 0 < n)
  (hn₁ : n ∈ sn)
  (nn : ↑sn)
  (hnn : nn = ⟨n, hn₁⟩)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists_36
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (hmo₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x = ↑(f₀ n x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (fc : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfc₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (fc n) = 1)
  (hfc₃ : StrictAnti fc)
  (sc : Set NNReal)
  (hsc₀ : sc = Set.range fc)
  (fr : NNReal → ℝ)
  (hfr : fr = fun x ↦ ↑x)
  (scr : Set ℝ)
  (hscr : scr = fr '' sc)
  (br cr : ℝ)
  (hbr₁ : 0 < br)
  (hu₅ : br ≤ cr)
  (hcr₃ : ∀ x ∈ scr, cr ≤ x)
  (hu₆ : br = cr)
  (n : ℕ)
  (hn₀ : 0 < n), f (n + 1) br.toNNReal < 1

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists_37
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)

  (n : ℕ)

  (hn₂ : n + 1 ∈ sn)
  (nn : ↑sn)
  (hnn : nn = ⟨n + 1, hn₂⟩)
  (hcr₁ : 0 < cr)
  (hn₃ : f (n + 1) (fc nn) = 1), f (n + 1) br.toNNReal < 1

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists_38
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (hmo₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f n))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (fc : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hfc₃ : StrictAnti fc)
  (sc : Set NNReal)
  (hsc₀ : sc = Set.range fc)
  (fr : NNReal → ℝ)
  (hfr : fr = fun x ↦ ↑x)
  (scr : Set ℝ)
  (hscr : scr = fr '' sc)
  (cr : ℝ)
  (hcr₃ : ∀ x ∈ scr, cr ≤ x)
  (n : ℕ)

  (hn₂ : n + 1 ∈ sn)
  (nn : ↑sn)
  (hnn : nn = ⟨n + 1, hn₂⟩)
  (hcr₁ : 0 < cr), f (n + 1) cr.toNNReal < f (n + 1) (fc nn)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists_41
theorems.statement:

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (hsd : sd = Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (hd₃ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), nd.1 + 1 ∈ sd)
  (hd₂ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), fd a b nd * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ fd a b ⟨nd.1 + 1, hd₃ nd⟩)
  (hi₀ : 2 ∈ sd)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (hi₁ : i = ⟨2, hi₀⟩)
  (nd : ↑sd)
  (hnd₀ : 2 ≤ nd.1), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (nd.1 - 2) ≤ f (↑nd) b - f (↑nd) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (hi₀ : 2 ∈ sd)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (hi₁ : i = ⟨2, hi₀⟩), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (2 - 2) ≤ f 2 b - f 2 a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (hsd : sd = Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (hd₃ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), nd.1 + 1 ∈ sd)
  (hd₂ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), fd a b nd * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ fd a b ⟨nd.1 + 1, hd₃ nd⟩)
  (i : ↑sd), ∀ (n : ℕ),
  2 ≤ n → fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 2) ≤ f n b - f n a → fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n + 1 - 2) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (hsd : sd = Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (hd₃ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), nd.1 + 1 ∈ sd)
  (hd₂ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), fd a b nd * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ fd a b ⟨nd.1 + 1, hd₃ nd⟩)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (n : ℕ)
  (hn₀ : 2 ≤ n)
  (hn₁ : fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 2) ≤ f n b - f n a)
  (hn₂ : n - 1 = n - 2 + 1), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 1) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (hd₃ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), nd.1 + 1 ∈ sd)
  (hd₂ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), fd a b nd * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ fd a b ⟨nd.1 + 1, hd₃ nd⟩)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (n : ℕ)
  (hn₀ : 2 ≤ n)
  (hn₁ : fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 2) ≤ f n b - f n a)
  (hn₂ : n - 1 = n - 2 + 1)
  (hn₃ : n ∈ sd)
  (nn : ↑sd := ⟨n, hn₃⟩)
  (hnn : nn.1 = n)
  (hn₄ : nn.1 + 1 ∈ sd), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 1) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (i : ↑sd)
  (n : ℕ)
  (hn₀ : 2 ≤ n)
  (hn₁ : fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 2) ≤ f n b - f n a)
  (hn₂ : n - 1 = n - 2 + 1)
  (hn₃ : n ∈ sd)
  (nn : ↑sd := ⟨n, hn₃⟩)
  (hnn : ↑nn = n)
  (hn₄ : nn.1 + 1 ∈ sd)
  (hn₅ : fd a b nn * (2 - 1 / ↑n) ≤ fd a b ⟨↑nn + 1, hn₄⟩), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 1) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_ind_7
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)

  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)

  (i : ↑sd)
  (n : ℕ)

  (hn₁ : fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 2) ≤ f n b - f n a)
  (hn₂ : n - 1 = n - 2 + 1)
  (hn₃ : n ∈ sd)
  (nn : ↑sd := ⟨n, hn₃⟩)
  (hnn : ↑nn = n)
  (hn₅ : fd a b nn * (2 - 1 / ↑n) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a), fd a b i * (3 / 2) ^ (n - 1) ≤ f (n + 1) b - f (n + 1) a

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (h₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x < f (n + 1) x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (hsd : sd = Set.Ici 2)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (ha₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd), f (↑n) a < f (↑n + 1) a ∧ f (↑n) b < f (↑n + 1) b)
  (hd₀ : ∀ (nd : ↑sd), nd.1 + 1 ∈ sd), ∀ (nd : ↑sd), fd a b nd * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ fd a b ⟨↑nd + 1, hd₀ nd⟩

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x < f (n + 1) x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (ha₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd), f (↑n) a < f (↑n + 1) a ∧ f (↑n) b < f (↑n + 1) b)
  (nd : ↑sd)
  (hnd₀ : 0 < nd.1), (f (↑nd) b - f (↑nd) a) * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ f (↑nd) b * (f (↑nd) b + 1 / ↑↑nd) - f (↑nd) a * (f (↑nd) a + 1 / ↑↑nd)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x < f (n + 1) x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (fd : NNReal → NNReal → ↑sd → ℝ)
  (hfd₁ : ∀ (y₁ y₂ : NNReal) (n : ↑sd), fd y₁ y₂ n = f (↑n) y₂ - f (↑n) y₁)
  (hd₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd) (a b : NNReal), a < b → 0 < fd a b n)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₀ : a < b)
  (ha₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd), f (↑n) a < f (↑n + 1) a ∧ f (↑n) b < f (↑n + 1) b)
  (nd : ↑sd)
  (hnd₀ : 0 < nd.1)
  (hnd₁ : f (↑nd) b * (f (↑nd) b + 1 / ↑↑nd) - f (↑nd) a * (f (↑nd) a + 1 / ↑↑nd) =
  ((f (↑nd) b - f (↑nd) a) * (f (↑nd) b + f (↑nd) a + 1 / ↑↑nd))), (f (↑nd) b - f (↑nd) a) * (2 - 1 / ↑↑nd) ≤ f (↑nd) b * (f (↑nd) b + 1 / ↑↑nd) - f (↑nd) a * (f (↑nd) a + 1 / ↑↑nd)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_4

∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x < f (n + 1) x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x)
  (sd : Set ℕ)
  (a b : NNReal)
  (ha₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sd), f (↑n) a < f (↑n + 1) a ∧ f (↑n) b < f (↑n + 1) b)
  (nd : ↑sd)
  (hnd₀ : 0 < nd.1), 2 - 1 / ↑↑nd ≤ f (↑nd) b + f (↑nd) a + 1 / ↑↑nd

  (hi : 2 ∈ sd)

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_unique_top_12

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → (f₀ n x = y ↔ fi n y = x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (fb : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hsn₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 < n.1)
  (hfb₀ : fb = fun (n : ↑sn) => fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n))
  (sb : Set NNReal)
  (hsb₀ : sb = Set.range fb)
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x), 1 / 2 ∉ sb

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → (f₀ n x = y ↔ fi n y = x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (fb : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hsn₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 < n.1)
  (hfb₀ : fb = fun (n:↑sn) => fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n))
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x), ∀ (n : ↑sn), fb n ≠ 1 / 2

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (sn : Set ℕ)
  (fb : ↑sn → NNReal)
  (sb : Set NNReal)
  (hsb₀ : sb = Set.range fb)
  (g₀ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), fb n ≠ 1 / 2), 1 / 2 ∉ sb

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → (f₀ n x = y ↔ fi n y = x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hsn₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 < n.1)
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x)
  (n : ↑sn), fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n) ≠ 1 / 2

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (fi : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₇ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x y : NNReal), 0 < n → (f₀ n x = y ↔ fi n y = x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hsn₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 < n.1)
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x)
  (n : ↑sn)
  (hn₀ : fi (↑n) (1 - 1 / ↑↑n) = 1 / 2), False

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_bonus_6_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : NNReal), f 1 x = ↑x)
  (h₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f (n + 1) x = f n x * (f n x + 1 / ↑n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f₀ n x = (f n x).toNNReal)
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)
  (hsn₁ : ∀ (n : ↑sn), 0 < n.1)
  (h₈ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → 0 < x → 1 - 1 / ↑n < f n x → f n x < f (n + 1) x)
  (n : ↑sn), f₀ (↑n) (1 / 2) ≠ 1 - 1 / ↑↑n

theorems.name: imo_1985_p6_exists_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℕ → NNReal → ℝ)
  (h₂ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n ∧ 0 < x → 0 < f n x)
  (hmo₀ : ∀ (n : ℕ), 0 < n → StrictMono (f n))
  (f₀ : ℕ → NNReal → NNReal)
  (hf₁ : ∀ (n : ℕ) (x : NNReal), 0 < n → f n x = ↑(f₀ n x))
  (sn : Set ℕ)
  (hsn₀ : sn = Set.Ici 1)

  (hxy1 : 2 * y ^ 2 ≤ x)
  (hxy : 2 • y ^ 2 ≤ x), 0 ≤ Nat.factorization x

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_8_10

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_9

  (h₂ : Real.log (↑x:ℝ) = Real.log ↑y * ↑x / (↑(y ^ 2:ℕ ):ℝ) )

  (hxy : y < x)

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_9_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (x y : ℕ)
  (h₀ : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x ^ y ^ 2 = y ^ x)
  (hxy : y < x)
  (h_exp : ↑x = rexp (Real.log ↑y) ^ (↑x / (↑y:ℝ) ^ 2)), x = y ^ (x / y ^ 2)

theorems.statement:
∀ (x y : ℕ)

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_10_1

  (h₃ : Real.log (↑x ^ y ^ 2) = Real.log (↑y ^ x)), ↑(y ^ 2:ℕ) * Real.log ↑x = ↑x * Real.log ↑y

  (h₃ : Real.log (↑x ^ y ^ 2) = Real.log (↑y ^ x))

  (h₄ : ↑(y ^ 2:ℕ) * Real.log ↑x = ↑x * Real.log ↑y), Real.log ↑x = Real.log ↑y * ↑x / ↑(y ^ 2:ℕ)

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_10_8

  (hc : ¬Real.log ↑x = ↑x * Real.log ↑y / ↑(y ^ 2:ℕ)), False

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_10_9

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_11_5

  (h₃ : x = y ^ (x / y ^ 2))
  (hk_def : k = x / y ^ 2)

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_11_7

theorems.name: imo_1997_p5_11_16

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → ∃ y, 0 < y ∧ g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y
  ∧ ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ y → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hc : x ≠ y), 2 * x * x < g x + g x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (g₁ : 2 * x * x < g x + g x)
  (g₂ : 2 * y * y < g y + g y), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (g₁ : 2 * x * x < g x + g x)
  (g₂ : 2 * y * y < g y + g y), (x - y) ^ 2 < 0

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (p : ℝ)
  (h₁₃ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ p → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z), 2 * x * x < g x + g x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hxyp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (p : ℝ)
  (h₁₃ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ p → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (hxp : x ≠ p), 2 * x * x < g x + g x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_7
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hxyp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (p : ℝ)
  (h₁₃ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ p → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (hxp : x ≠ p), ¬g x + g x ≤ 2 * x * x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_8
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (p : ℝ)
  (h₁₃ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ p → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (hxp : ¬x ≠ p), 2 * x * x < g x + g x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_1_9
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (p : ℝ)
  (h₁₃ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ p → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (hxp : x = p), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_2_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y → x = y)
  (x y: ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (h₁₁ : 0 < y)
  (h₁₂ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y), x = y

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_2_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (h₁₂ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (hxy : x = y), g x ≤ x ^ 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → ∃ y, 0 < y ∧ g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y
  ∧ ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ y → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y → x = y)
  (h₂ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → g x ≤ x ^ 2)
  (hc : ∃ x, 0 < x ∧ g x < x ^ 2), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → ∃ y, 0 < y ∧ g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y ∧ ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ y → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y → x = y)
  (h₂ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → g x ≤ x ^ 2)
  (x z d₁ : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (h₃ : g x < x ^ 2)
  (hd₀ : d₁ = x ^ 2 - g x)
  (hd₁ : g x = x ^ 2 - d₁)
  (hz : z = x + √d₁), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x z d₁ : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (h₃ : g x < x ^ 2)
  (hd₀ : d₁ = x ^ 2 - g x)
  (hz : z = x + √d₁), 0 < z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x z d₁: ℝ)
  (h₃ : g x < x ^ 2)
  (hd₀ : d₁ = x ^ 2 - g x)
  (hz : z = x + √d₁), z ≠ x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₂ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → g x ≤ x ^ 2)
  (x z d₁: ℝ)
  (h₃ : g x < x ^ 2)
  (hd₁ : g x = x ^ 2 - d₁)
  (hz : z = x + √d₁)
  (hzp : 0 < z), g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y → x = y)
  (x z : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (hzp : 0 < z)
  (hxz : z ≠ x)
  (h₅ : g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (y : ℝ)
  (hyp : 0 < y)
  (h₆ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y)
  (h₇ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ y → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_7
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y → x = y)
  (x : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (y : ℝ)
  (hyp : 0 < y)
  (h₆ : g x + g y ≤ 2 * x * y), x = y

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_8
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x z : ℝ)
  (hzp : 0 < z)
  (hxz : z ≠ x)
  (y : ℝ)
  (h₇ : ∀ (z : ℝ), 0 < z ∧ z ≠ y → ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z)
  (hxy : x = y), ¬g x + g z ≤ 2 * x * z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_10
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x z d₁ : ℝ)
  (h₃ : g x < x ^ 2)
  (hd₁ : g x = x ^ 2 - d₁)
  (hz : z = x + √d₁), x ^ 2 - d₁ + z ^ 2 ≤ 2 * x * z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_simp_3_11
theorems.statement:
∀ (g : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₂ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → g x ≤ x ^ 2)
  (x z d₁ : ℝ)
  (hzp : 0 < z)
  (h₅₂ : x ^ 2 - d₁ + z ^ 2 ≤ 2 * x * z), x ^ 2 - d₁ + g z ≤ 2 * x * z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₀ : ∀ (x : ℝ), 0 < x → ∃! y, 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (hc : x ≠ y), x * f x + x * f x > 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (z : ℝ)
  (h₁₂ : ∀ (y : ℝ), (fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) y → y = z), x * f x + x * f x > 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (z : ℝ)
  (h₁₂ : ∀ (y : ℝ), (fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) y → y = z), y = z

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_4
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x z : ℝ)
  (h₁₂ : ∀ (y : ℝ), (fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) y → y = z)
  (hxz : ¬x = z), ¬(fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_5
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁₇ : ¬(0 < x ∧ x * f x + x * f x ≤ 2)), x * f x + x * f x > 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_6
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁₇ : 0 < x → 2 < x * f x + x * f x), x * f x + x * f x > 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_7
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (hc : x ≠ y)
  (h₁₀ : 1 < x * f x)
  (h₁₁ : 1 < y * f y), False

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_8
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁ : x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (h₁₅ : 1 / x < f x)
  (h₁₆ : 1 / y < f y), x / y + y / x < 2

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_9
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (h₁₆ : 1 / y < f y), x / y < x * f y

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_10
theorems.statement:
∀ (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (hc : x ≠ y), 2 < x / y + y / x

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_1_11
theorems.statement:
∀ (x y : ℝ)
  (hp : 0 < x ∧ 0 < y)
  (hc : x ≠ y), 2 * x * y < (x / y + y / x) * x * y

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_2_1
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2 → x = y)
  (x : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (y : ℝ)
  (h₂ : (fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) y), x * f x ≤ 1

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_2_2
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (h₁ : ∀ (x y : ℝ), 0 < x ∧ 0 < y → x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2 → x = y)
  (x : ℝ)
  (hxp : 0 < x)
  (y : ℝ)
  (h₂ : (fun y => 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2) y), x = y

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_2_3
theorems.statement:
∀ (f : ℝ → ℝ)
  (x y : ℝ)
  (h₂ : 0 < y ∧ x * f y + y * f x ≤ 2)
  (hxy : x = y), x * f x ≤ 1

theorems.name: imo_2022_p2_3_1
theorems.statement:
